member.name: M:Cyggie.Plugins.UnityHTTP.Services.UnityHTTPService.AddDefaultHeaders(System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}[])
member.summary:
Add default headers to all requests
This does not include requests created outside of the service
member.param: Headers to always include in future requests

member.name: M:Cyggie.Plugins.UnityHTTP.Services.UnityHTTPService.ClearDefaultHeaders
member.summary: Clear default headers that were previously added
